mapper.select: SELECT program_number, program_name, program_location, program_start_date, program_end_date, program_start_time, program_end_time, program_fee, program_apply_start_date, program_apply_end_date, program_date, program_recruited_count, program_recruited_total_count, program_view_count, program_phone_number, program_image, member_number FROM tbl_program order by program_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
select count(program_number) from tbl_program where #{today} BETWEEN program_apply_start_date AND program_apply_end_date

SELECT program_number, program_name, program_location, program_start_date, program_end_date, program_start_time, program_end_time, program_fee, program_apply_start_date, program_apply_end_date, program_date, program_recruited_count, program_recruited_total_count, program_view_count, program_phone_number, program_image, member_number FROM tbl_program where program_number = ${programNumber}
